contextId.information: The abstract noun "wrath" can be translated with the verb "punish." AT: "God will continue to punish him" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_abstractnouns]])
contextId.quote: wrath of God stays on him

contextId.information: The abstract noun "sin" can be expressed with the verb sin. AT: "The one among you is has never sinned" or "If any one of you has never sinned" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_abstractnouns]])
contextId.quote: The one among you who has no sin
